description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as a welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for the invoice backend, including welcome message, API documentation redirect, health status, and application info.
